tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Murthy has been the most friendly dr. I have ever met and it is so important to have a dr. Who can strike a conversation related to your health or anything under the sun. Due to this sometimes the wait can be a little longer. But she was very frank and confident with the treatment. I had a normal delivery the first time and was keen to have a normal one again. She assured me that she will go for normal. Towards the last trimester, I had high BP and complications on the delivery day. Inspite of this, she made  sure that I have a normal delivery. Although to some extent it could have turned out fatal. But she assured me throughout my delivery that nothing would happen and she will ensure everything goes well. Honestly, I felt my baby girl gave her a hard time.... When my baby was born, she told me that it’s underweight but not to worry as she is very healthy and seems to be a smart and strong one. That was so kind of her. She made me very comfortable with those words.
Thank you doctor, for the kind words and assurance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Our first visit and experience with Dr. Jayashree was good. Her confidence is a reassurance. She did not hurry us into any treatments, procedures, and diagnostic tests. She explained all options available and how it works and leaves the rest to the patient's choice. It was overall a nice experience and we are glad to have found a good doctor like Dr. Jayashree Murthy,  near our home, at this critical juncture.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was my first time visiting a gynaecologist ever.. And I must mention that I am glad it was doctor jayashree who was my first. She was absolutely friendly, patient and very approachable. She made me very comfortable and discussed all the issues I had. I would recommend her without second thought.. Aftr one doze of the medicine itself my problem started to resolve.

tags: None
review:
Very, positive, listens and explains carefully, she remembers most of the things from past discussion and doesn't hurry in scanning.
she seems to have very good exp and knowledge on the subject. Even though she is quite busy, she wont get hurried up and wont loose patience.
you can be rest assured for her calmness.

tags: None
review: I was really happy when I started consulting Dr Jayashree. She kept telling me that we will go.for normal delivery. But on my delivery day don't know what happened to her though the conditions were normal and everything was fine, it's just that my dilation was taking time she started telling me for c section. I wanted to wait fo few more hours but one sentence she told me still hurts me " At 7 I have to go to my clinic so please decide". I trusted her so much but just because she was getting late for her clinic she did not want to wait for normal delivery and did c section. Guys it's very difficult to trust a doctor. I recommended her to all my friends to that level I trusted her. One of my friend had the same case as mine but her doctor waited for 14 hours after giving epidural and induced the labor again and finally delivered normally but my luck was not supportive probably that's y my doctor did not support me. She could have easily waited for few more hours. In.my case she waited only for 5 hours after epidural

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Well,  Its very hard to find trustworthy doctors these days .After visiting several big doctors in Bangalore , I came to her and I must say,  *** ** *** ** *** **** ***** **** ******** ** *** She is full of positive energy and had kept me tension free in my entire pregnancy.When I saw her in the operation theatre on the delivery date  , half of my worry was gone after seeing her . She is strong , fearless , confident and not to forget very motherly at heart.
Thank you so much Doctor Jayshree .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had great treatment experience with Dr, she makes the patient comfortable, explains the issue and provides suitable solutions ******* *********** ***** *** ******Thank you doctor , you are one of the best we came across.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would strongly recommend Dr. Jayashree. She is very patient & listen to us. Her experience speaks in the way of her treatment...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is an extremely experienced doc...does not rush thru patients..very friendly and approachable. She tries her best for normal delivery but knows whn nt to push fr it acc to patient profile. Will definitely consult her 2nd time around.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: It was the first visit and she took all the time to understand my problems and patiently explain the condition. I would like to followup with her.

review: Visited the doctor for the pregnancy check up for my wife... She is more confident abt her treatment and will explain in detail... She won't recommend medication unnecessaryily... Now we are the happiest parents of baby boy... If u wanna visit gynaecologist go to her blindly without a second thought....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is one of the most wonderful doctors i have consulted in my life ...
she treats me like her daughter and she understand the emergencies of patient and ready to receive the call and ans them, if required even give prescriptions online.
She is maintained good relationship with her patient.

In whole, she is a person who will push or try for normal delivery and Cesarean is the last option.

tags: None
review:
She is very good, communicates clearly and gives the right advise. 

Please wait if you have to, but only meet Dr Jayashree.

review: My mother underwent Hysterectomy. Everything went smoothly according to the plan. She recovered quickly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Murthy provided very frank and direct direction to new to be mother and her family without prescribing any unnecessary tests or medication. She very well explained everything in a patient manner and professionally.
